amendment.description: Amendment requires any unexpected balances for the FHA Refinance Program that are rescinded and canceled under the bill to be retained in the general fund of the Treasury for reducing the debt of the federal government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to require any unexpected balances for the FHA Refinance Program that are rescinded and canceled under the bill to be retained in the general fund of the Treasury for reducing the debt of the federal government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
